desc: A Bitcoin Tree Forum is a dedicated space for long term thinking. It's an attempt to leverage Bitcoin to expand our time horizons. The Nakamoto Tree Project (BTreeC.com) seeks to plants trees (Giant Sequoias ideally) and run public Bitcoin nodes in order to push Bitcoin into the public sphere in a positive way

layout.text: By buying stuff, you support the Nakamoto Tree Project which seeks to broaden Bitcoin's appeal by planting groves of trees and establishing public Bitcoin nodes. Learn more at BTreeC.com
